instructions: Sign in to your AdSense account. In the "Verify your phone number" card, enter your phone number in international format. Phone numbers in international format begin with a plus (+) sign, followed by the country code, the area code, and the phone number: +(Country code)(Area code)(Phone number) Examples: +14155552671, +441234567890 If you've previously verified a phone number for Google, you'll see your verified phone number listed in the Phone number field. You can choose to use this phone number for AdSense and skip the rest of the phone verification process. Choose whether you d like to receive your verification code by text message or voice call. Click Get verification code . On the next page, enter the 6-digit verification code that we sent you and click Submit .
